title: Test Parameter Types
description: Template to test supported artifact parameter types.

stringParam.description: Any text string is allowed, including spaces.

securestringParam.description: Any text string is allowed, including spaces, and will be presented in UI as masked characters.

boolParam.description: Only valid boolean values are allowed (i.e. true, false, 0, 1).

selectParam.description: Only a selection from the list is allowed.

arrayParam.description: To specify multiple values, format them as a JSON array (e.g. ["item1", "item2"]).

objectParam.description: To specify multiple properties, format them as a JSON object (e.g. { prop1: "value1", prop2: "value2" }).

extraLogLines.description: Number of additional lines to log as part of the Extension Message.

forceFail.description: For the artifact to fail by throwing an exception.

runCommand.commandToExecute: [concat('powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy bypass "& ./artifact.ps1 -StringParam ''', parameters('stringParam'), ''' -SecureStringParam (ConvertTo-SecureString ''', parameters('securestringParam'), ''' -AsPlainText -Force) -IntParam ', parameters('intParam'), ' -BoolParam:$', parameters('boolParam'), ' -FileContentsParam ''', parameters('fileContentsParam'), ''' -ExtraLogLines ', parameters('extraLogLines'), ' -ForceFail:$', parameters('forceFail'), '"')]
